name: Pushover Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Pushover Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume Pushover API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume Pushover API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: message
available_options: Message (值: message)
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: push
available_options: Push (值: push)
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

userKey.name: userKey
userKey.description: The user/group key (not e-mail address) of your user (or you), viewable when logged into the dashboard (often referred to as `USER_KEY` in the libraries and code examples)
userKey.natural_language_description: 参数名: User Key | 作用: The user/group key (not e-mail address) of your user (or you), viewable when logged into the dashboard (often referred to as `USER_KEY` in the libraries and code examples) | (必填项)

message.name: message
message.natural_language_description: 参数名: Message | 作用: Your message | (必填项)

priority.name: priority
priority.description: Send as -2 to generate no notification/alert, -1 to always send as a quiet notification, 1 to display as high-priority and bypass the user's quiet hours, or 2 to also require confirmation from the user
priority.natural_language_description: 参数名: Priority | 作用: Send as -2 to generate no notification/alert, -1 to always send as a quiet notification, 1 to display as high-priority and bypass the user's quiet hours, or 2 to also require confirmation from the user | 默认值: -2
available_options: Lowest Priority (值: -2)
Low Priority (值: -1)
Normal Priority (值: 0)
High Priority (值: 1)
Emergency Priority (值: 2)

retry.name: retry
retry.description: Specifies how often (in seconds) the Pushover servers will send the same notification to the user. This parameter must have a value of at least 30 seconds between retries.
retry.natural_language_description: 参数名: Retry (Seconds) | 作用: Specifies how often (in seconds) the Pushover servers will send the same notification to the user. This parameter must have a value of at least 30 seconds between retries. | 默认值: 30 | (必填项)

expire.name: expire
expire.description: Specifies how many seconds your notification will continue to be retried for (every retry seconds)
expire.natural_language_description: 参数名: Expire (Seconds) | 作用: Specifies how many seconds your notification will continue to be retried for (every retry seconds) | 默认值: 30 | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: attachmentsUi (值: None)
device (值: None) - Your user's device name to send the message directly to that device, rather than all of the user's devices (multiple devices may be separated by a comma)
html (值: None) - Whether to enable messages formatting with HTML tags
sound (值: None) - The name of one of the sounds supported by device clients to override the user's default sound choice. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
timestamp (值: None) - A Unix timestamp of your message's date and time to display to the user, rather than the time your message is received by our API
title (值: None) - Your message's title, otherwise your app's name is used
timestamp (值: None) - A Unix timestamp of your message's date and time to display to the user, rather than the time your message is received by our API
url (值: None) - A supplementary URL to show with your message
url_title (值: None) - A title for your supplementary URL, otherwise just the URL is shown
